attributes.action: call a General Election in respect of the people of Great Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I know we have had an e-petition about this same topic before however, this  hapless un-elected Prime Minister is creating disaster after disaster for this, our, country! Gordon Brown is a big contributory to the current state of affairs in Britain. It is high time he gave up the reigns to a man or woman who can get Britain back on its feet and give us all something Great to be proud of! Please sign guys and pass this on! Give people there human right to vote!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
